word_mean: 〔复mosquitoes〕蚊：蚊科(Culicidae)许多属吸血的和有毒的昆虫，包括库蚊属(Culex)、伊蚊属(Aedes)、按蚊属(Anopheles)、曼蚊属(Mansonia)、趋血蚊属(Haemagogus)、鳞蚊属(Psorophora)、赛保蚊属(Theobaldia)及恰蚊属(Chagasia)

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Spanish and Portuguese, diminutive of mosca, from Latin musca 'fly'

entry.def: Mosquitos are small flying insects which bite people and animals in order to suck their blood.

means.word_mean: 1. two-winged insect whose female has a long proboscis to pierce the skin and suck the blood of humans and animals
